title: How to Make a March Madness on Crack Drink

steps.headline: Pour the vodka into a glass.
Pour the triple sec into the glass.
Pour the peach schnapps into the glass.
Pour the amp into the glass.
Pour the gatorade into the glass.

text: Pour the vodka into a glass.  Pour the triple sec into the glass.  Pour the peach schnapps into the glass.  Pour the amp into the glass.  Pour the gatorade into the glass.  Mix well. Drink straight.
